availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Swinford (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Swinford and Julia Nolan Swinford. Married to Mary H. Thornton Swinford in Clermont County, Ohio, on April 9, 1863. Father of Charles Swinford. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 101A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 589.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Berrys District, p. 83A.
Ohio Marriage Records, Various Ohio County Courthouses, Ohio, Clermont County Marriages, Film #000327563, p. 312.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Harrison County, KY, June & July 1863, p. 395.
